org.alienideology.jcord.handle.guild

Interface IMemberManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MemberManager

    public interface IMemberManager
    IMemberManager - The manager that manages and perform actions upon a member. If the action involves multiple members or scopes in the guild level (For example: kick, ban, unban), then the method can be found in IGuildManager.
    Since:
    0.0.4
    Author:
    AlienIdeology

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int NICKNAME_LENGTH
      The maximum length of a nickname.

    • Method Detail

      • getIdentity

        default Identity getIdentity()
        Get the identity the manager's guild belongs to.
        Returns:
        The identity.

      • getGuild

        IGuild getGuild()
        Get the guild the member belongs to.
        Returns:
        The guild.

      • getMember

        IMember getMember()
        Get the member this manager manages.
        Returns:
        The member.

      • modifyNickname

        void modifyNickname(java.lang.String nickname)
        Modify the nickname of this member. Use empty or null nicknames to reset the nickname.
        Parameters:
        nickname - The new nickname.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have either Change Nickname permission to modify itself, or Manage Nicknames permission to manage other nicknames.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is the server owner or have higher role than the identity.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the nickname is longer than 32.

      • modifyRoles

        void modifyRoles(java.util.Collection<IRole> add,
                 java.util.Collection<IRole> remove)
        Modify roles of this member. Pass two collections of roles to specify roles to add or remove. Duplicated roles will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        add - The roles to add.
        remove - The roles to remove.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        ErrorResponseException - If one of the roles does not belong to this guild.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is the server owner or have higher role than the identity.

      • modifyRoles

        void modifyRoles(java.util.Collection<IRole> modified)
        Modify roles of this member by passing all the roles this member wll have. Note that this will override all roles the member once had.
        Parameters:
        modified - The modified roles.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        ErrorResponseException - If one of the roles does not belong to this guild.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is the server owner or have higher role than the identity.

      • addRoles

        void addRoles(IRole... roles)
        Add roles to this member.
        Parameters:
        roles - The role to be added.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        ErrorResponseException - If one of the roles does not belong to this guild.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is the server owner or have higher role than the identity.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the member already had that role.

      • addRoles

        void addRoles(java.util.Collection<IRole> roles)
        Add roles to this member.
        Parameters:
        roles - The roles to be added.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        ErrorResponseException - If one of the roles does not belong to this guild.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is the server owner or have higher role than the identity.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the member already had that role.

      • removeRoles

        void removeRoles(IRole... roles)
        Remove roles from this member.
        Parameters:
        roles - The roles to be removed.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        ErrorResponseException - If one of the roles does not belong to this guild.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is the server owner or have higher role than the identity.

      • removeRoles

        void removeRoles(java.util.Collection<IRole> roles)
        Remove roles from this member.
        Parameters:
        roles - The roles to be removed.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the identity does not have Manage Roles permission.
        ErrorResponseException -
        • If the member does not belong to this guild.
        • If the role does not belong to this guild.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is the server owner or have higher role than the identity.

      • moveToVoiceChannel

        void moveToVoiceChannel(IVoiceChannel channel)
        Move this member to a voice channel.
        Parameters:
        channel - The new channel.
        Throws:
        PermissionException -
        • If the identity does not have Move Members permission.
        • If the identity does not have Connect permission to connect to the specific channel.
        ErrorResponseException - If the voice channel does not belongs to this guild.
        See Also:
        ErrorResponse.UNKNOWN_CHANNEL

      • moveToVoiceChannel

        void moveToVoiceChannel(java.lang.String channelId)
        Move this member to a voice channel bt ID.
        Parameters:
        channelId - The new channel's ID.
        Throws:
        PermissionException -
        • If the identity does not have Move Members permission.
        • If the identity does not have Connect permission to connect to the specific channel.
        ErrorResponseException - If the voice channel does not belongs to this guild.
        See Also:
        ErrorResponse.UNKNOWN_CHANNEL

      • mute

        void mute(boolean mute)
        Mute or unmute this member.
        Parameters:
        mute - True to mute, false to unmute.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the member does not have Mute Members permission.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is the server owner or have higher role than the identity.
        ErrorResponseException - If the member does not belong to this guild.
        See Also:
        ErrorResponse.UNKNOWN_MEMBER

      • deafen

        void deafen(boolean deafen)
        Deafen or undeafen this member.
        Parameters:
        deafen - True to deafen the member, false to undeafen.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the member does not have Deafen Members permission.
        HigherHierarchyException - If the member is the server owner or have higher role than the identity.
        ErrorResponseException - If the member does not belong to this guild.
        See Also:
        ErrorResponse.UNKNOWN_MEMBER
